fr.escape.game.entity

Interface Updateable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bonus, Boss, Entity, Ship, Shot, Weapon
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBonus, AbstractBoss, AbstractShip, AbstractShot, AbstractWeapon, BlackHoleShot, EarthShot, EntityContainer, FireBallShot, JupiterShot, MissileShot, MoonShot, ShiboleetShot

    public interface Updateable

    An interface for Entity which can update themselves without external help.

    Kind of Flag for Entity

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(Graphics graphics, long delta)
      Update the state of the Entity.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(Graphics graphics,
          long delta)

        Update the state of the Entity.

        This Entity can use the given Graphics if it's a Drawable.

        Parameters:
        graphics - Graphics which can be used for drawing this Entity.
        delta - Time elapsed since the last update
